name: Magnetic Blocks
description:
Move blocks in all four directions. All blocks move at the same time. The goal is to put blocks into the respective color targets. Blocks with the same color join when they touch each other.

Controls:

Left, Right, Up, Down - move blocks

R - restart level

Backspace - undo last move

These are the first 25 levels out of total 200 releasing soon on mobile.

Let me know if you like it!
